se.nicklasgavelin.sphero
Interface RobotListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Experimental_Main
public interface RobotListener

Interface for listening on a robot. You need to perform Robot.addListener to listen for robot events

Author:
Nicklas Gavelin, nicklas.gavelin@gmail.com, Lule√• University of Technology

Nested Class Summary
static class RobotListener.EVENT_CODE
          Event codes for the Robot
 
Method Summary
 void event(Robot r, RobotListener.EVENT_CODE code)
          Called when a specific event has occurred, the code given is the type of event that occurred.
 void informationResponseReceived(Robot r, InformationResponseMessage response)
          Called when an information response is received (streaming event or similar)
 void responseReceived(Robot r, ResponseMessage response, CommandMessage dc)
          Called when a response is received for the robot the robot listener is listening on
 

Method Detail

responseReceived

void responseReceived(Robot r,
                      ResponseMessage response,
                      CommandMessage dc)
Called when a response is received for the robot the robot listener is listening on

Parameters:
r - The robot connected to the response
response - The response received
dc - The command the response is for

event

void event(Robot r,
           RobotListener.EVENT_CODE code)
Called when a specific event has occurred, the code given is the type of event that occurred.

Parameters:
r - The robot that is connected to the event
code - The EVENT_CODE that occurred (RobotListener.EVENT_CODE)

informationResponseReceived

void informationResponseReceived(Robot r,
                                 InformationResponseMessage response)
Called when an information response is received (streaming event or similar)

Parameters:
r - The robot the message was received for
response - The response itself
